  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_83240</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83240</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Electromagnetic spectrum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektromagnetisches Spektrum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Spectre électromagnétique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Spectrum eletromagnético</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spettro elettromagnetico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρομαγνητικό φάσμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Espectro electromágnetico</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram of an electromagnetic spectrum shows waves with longer wavelengths than infra-red waves and waves with shorter waves than ultraviolet waves.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electromagnetic spectrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Gamma rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">infra-red waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Microwaves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Radio waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ultraviolet waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wavelengths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">X-rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm der Erscheinen eines 
elektromagnetischen Spektrums bewegt mit längeren Wellenlängen als 
Infrarotwellen und Wellen mit kürzeren Wellen wellenartig, als 
Ultraviolet wellenartig bewegt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme des expositions d'un spectre 
électromagnétique ondule avec de plus longues longueurs d'onde que 
les vagues infrarouges et les vagues avec des vagues plus courtes que 
l'ultra-violet ondule.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama de mostras de um spectrum 
eletromagnético acena com wavelengths mais longos do que ondas 
infravermelhas e ondas com ondas mais curtas do que a ultravioleta 
acena.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema delle esposizioni di spettro 
elettromagnetico fluttua con le lunghezze d'onda più lunghe che le 
onde infrarosse e le onde con le onde più corte che il ultraviolet 
fluttua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα ενός ηλεκτρομαγνητικού φάσματος 
εμφανίζει τα κύματα με τα πιό μακροχρόνια μήκη κύματος από τα 
υπέρυθρα κύματα και κύμα με τα πιό σύντομα κύματα από τα 
υπεριώδη κύματα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama de las demostraciones de un espectro
electromágnetico agita con longitudes de onda más largas que ondas 
infrarrojas y ondas con ondas cortas que el ultravioleta agita.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektromagnetisches Spektrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gamma Strahlen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Infrarotwellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mikrowellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funkwellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ultravioletwellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wellenlängen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Röntgenstrahlen</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
